infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: RunRoute needs access to your location to track your runs and plan routes.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: RunRoute needs access to your location to track your runs in the background.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: RunRoute needs access to your location to track your runs in the background.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow RunRoute to use your location to track runs.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: Allow RunRoute to track runs in the background.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow RunRoute to use your location to track runs.
